RPGNautas.FileManager.Config.Title: Local Index Management
RPGNautas.FileManager.Config.RepairLinks: Checks all world image references. If it finds a broken link (404) that has a WebP version available, it will update the reference automatically.
RPGNautas.FileManager.Config.IndexHint: This generates the index file. Scanning includes world and compendiums.
RPGNautas.FileManager.Config.MassConvert: This will find all images in the world (PNG, JPG) and convert them to WebP, updating documents automatically. **BACKUP recommended first.**
RPGNautas.FileManager.Notify.RepairCompl: RPGNautas: Link repair complete! {count} references updated.
RPGNautas.FileManager.Dialog.ConfirmRepa: Do you want to check and adjust broken links that now have WebP versions? This operation will update world actors and scenes.
RPGNautas.FileManager.Dialog.ConfirmMass: Do you want to convert ALL images in the world to WebP? This operation may take some time and it's highly recommended to have a world backup.
